[blockly](./blockly.md) &gt; [Variables](./blockly.variables_namespace.md) &gt; [getVariable](./blockly.variables_namespace.getvariable_1_function.md)

## Variables.getVariable() function

Look up a variable on the given workspace. Always looks in the main workspace before looking in the flyout workspace. Always prefers lookup by ID to lookup by name + type.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getVariable(workspace: Workspace, id: string | null, opt_name?: string, opt_type?: string): VariableModel | null;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  workspace | [Workspace](./blockly.workspace_class.md) | The workspace to search for the variable. It may be a flyout workspace or main workspace. |
|  id | string \| null | The ID to use to look up the variable, or null. |
|  opt\_name | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The string to use to look up the variable. Only used if lookup by ID fails. |
|  opt\_type | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The type to use to look up the variable. Only used if lookup by ID fails. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[VariableModel](./blockly.variablemodel_class.md) \| null

The variable corresponding to the given ID or name + type combination, or null if not found.
